Detailed Description

Keeps list of all the cameras and sends camera data down to the correct location

◆ last_update_time()

RJ::Time vision_filter::World::last_update_time ( ) const
inline
Returns
Timestamp of the latest vision receiver message that was used to updated the states. Initialized with RJ::Time::min().

Updates all the child cameras given a set of new camera frames

Parameters
calc_timeCurrent iteration time
new_framesList of new frames from ssl vision
update_allWhether to update the cameras without vision measurements
Note
